steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open Paint application
steps.verification: Paint window title should be 'Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Create New Document
steps.description: Create a new document in Paint
steps.verification: Paint canvas should be empty

steps.name: Draw House
steps.description: Use Paint tools to draw a house

actions.expected_result: User has time to draw lines for house shape

steps.verification: House shape should be visible on canvas

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Launch Microsoft Paint application.
steps.verification: Window title should be 'Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Create New Document
steps.description: Create a new document in Paint.
steps.verification: Document size should be 800x600 pixels

steps.name: Select Brush Tool
steps.description: Select the Brush tool in Paint.
steps.verification: Tool palette should display Brush icon

steps.name: Draw Rectangle
steps.description: Draw a rectangle on the canvas.
steps.verification: Canvas should display a rectangle at (100,100)

steps.name: Draw Door
steps.description: Draw a door on the canvas.
steps.verification: Canvas should display a door at (300,200)

steps.name: Draw Window
steps.description: Draw a window on the canvas.
steps.verification: Canvas should display a window at (500,300)

steps.name: Draw Roof
steps.description: Draw a roof on the canvas.
steps.verification: Canvas should display a roof at (700,400)

steps.name: Save Document
steps.description: Save the document.
steps.verification: File save dialog should appear

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open the Paint application
steps.verification: Window title should be 'Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Create New File
steps.description: Create a new file in Paint
steps.verification: Title bar should display 'Untitled'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House
steps.description: Draw a rectangle to serve as the house outline
steps.verification: Rectangle should be visible on the canvas

steps.name: Draw Roof of House
steps.description: Draw a triangle to serve as the house roof
steps.verification: Triangle should be visible on the canvas

steps.name: Launch Paint
steps.description: Launch Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Window title is 'Run'

steps.name: Open Paint
steps.description: Open Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Window title is 'Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Create New File
steps.description: Create a new file in Paint application
steps.verification: File title is 'Untitled'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle
steps.description: Draw a rectangle on the canvas
steps.verification: Rectangle is visible on the canvas

steps.name: Draw Door
steps.description: Draw a door above the rectangle
steps.verification: Door is visible on the canvas

steps.name: Draw Roof
steps.description: Draw a roof above the door
steps.verification: Roof is visible on the canvas

steps.name: Save File
steps.description: Save the file as 'house.png'
steps.verification: File saved successfully

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Window title should be 'Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Create New File
steps.description: Create a new file in Paint
steps.verification: File name should be 'Untitled'

steps.name: Set Drawing Size
steps.description: Set drawing size to 500x300 pixels
steps.verification: Status bar should display '500x300'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the house
steps.verification: Rectangle should be visible on canvas

steps.name: Draw Door and Windows
steps.description: Draw door and windows for the house
steps.verification: Door and windows should be drawn

steps.name: Save File as PNG
steps.description: Save file as 'house.png' in Paint
steps.verification: File should be saved as 'house.png'

steps.name: Launch Paint
steps.description: Open Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Window title is 'Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Create New Canvas
steps.description: Create a new, blank canvas in Paint
steps.verification: Canvas dimensions are 640x480

steps.name: Select Brush Tool
steps.description: Switch to the Brush tool in Paint
steps.verification: Tool bar displays 'Brush'

steps.name: Draw the House
steps.description: Draw a house using the Brush tool
steps.verification: Canvas displays a house shape

steps.name: Save the Image
steps.description: Save the image as a PNG file
steps.verification: File 'house.png' exists in directory

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Program 'Paint' is listed in the Run dialog box

steps.name: Open Paint Application
steps.description: Open Paint application from Run dialog box

actions.expected_result: Paint application is selected in the Run dialog box

steps.verification: Program 'Paint' is highlighted in the list of results

steps.name: Launch Paint Application
steps.description: Start the Paint application
steps.verification: Paint window is opened with title 'Untitled - Paint'

steps.name: Create New Canvas
steps.description: Create a new canvas in Paint application

actions.expected_result: New window with title 'Untitled - Paint' appears

steps.verification: Window title is updated to 'Untitled - Paint'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Base
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the house base using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Rectangle tool icon is highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Walls
steps.description: Draw two rectangles for the house walls using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Second rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Two rectangle tools are highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House Roof
steps.description: Draw a triangle for the house roof using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Triangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Triangle tool icon is highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Door and Windows
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the door and two small rectangles for the windows using Paint application

actions.expected_result: Third rectangle tool is selected in toolbar

steps.verification: Three rectangle tools are highlighted in toolbar

steps.name: Draw Final Touches
steps.description: Add final touches to the house drawing using Paint application

actions.expected_result: User has enough time to add final touches

steps.verification: House drawing is complete with final touches

steps.name: Launch Paint
steps.description: Open Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Check if 'Paint' is in the taskbar and a window is open

steps.name: Create New Image
steps.description: Create a new image in Paint with default settings
steps.verification: Check if a new image is created with default settings

steps.name: Select Brush Tool
steps.description: Select the Brush tool in Paint
steps.verification: Check if the Brush tool icon is highlighted

steps.name: Set Color to Black
steps.description: Select black color for the brush

actions.expected_result: The color is changed to black

steps.verification: Check if the color palette shows black as selected

steps.name: Draw Rectangle
steps.description: Draw a rectangle on the canvas

actions.expected_result: A rectangle is drawn on the canvas

steps.verification: Check if a rectangle is drawn with specified coordinates

steps.name: Draw Door
steps.description: Draw a door on the canvas

actions.expected_result: A door is drawn on the canvas

steps.verification: Check if a door is drawn with specified coordinates

steps.name: Draw Window
steps.description: Draw a window on the canvas

actions.expected_result: A window is drawn on the canvas

steps.verification: Check if a window is drawn with specified coordinates

steps.name: Save Image
steps.description: Save the image as 'house.png'
steps.verification: Check if the file 'house.png' exists in the specified location

steps.name: Launch Paint
steps.description: Open Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Check for 'Microsoft Paint' title in window list

steps.name: Set up drawing canvas
steps.description: Create a new 800x600 pixel image
steps.verification: Check for 'Untitled' title in window list and 800x600 pixel canvas size

steps.name: Draw house outline
steps.description: Use black pen to draw a rectangular house outline

actions.expected_result: Pen starts drawing at specified location
Pen is moved to next location
Pen ends drawing at specified location

steps.verification: Check for house outline drawn on canvas

steps.name: Draw roof and doors
steps.description: Use black pen to draw a triangular roof and rectangular doors

actions.expected_result: Pen starts drawing at specified location
Pen is moved to next location
Pen ends drawing at specified location

steps.verification: Check for roof and doors drawn on canvas

steps.name: Save image
steps.description: Save the completed house drawing as a JPEG file

actions.expected_result: Image is saved as JPEG file

steps.verification: Check for 'File Saved' message in Paint window

steps.name: Launch Paint Program
steps.description: Open the Microsoft Paint application
steps.verification: Window title is 'Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Create New Document
steps.description: Create a new, blank document in Paint
steps.verification: Window title is 'Untitled - Microsoft Paint'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House
steps.description: Draw a rectangle to serve as the foundation of the house

params.target: Click and drag to draw rectangle

steps.verification: Rectangle is visible on the canvas

steps.name: Draw Door and Windows
steps.description: Draw a door and two windows above the rectangle foundation

params.target: Click and drag to draw door
Click and drag to draw two windows

actions.expected_result: Two windows are drawn on canvas

steps.verification: Door and two windows are visible on the canvas

steps.name: Draw Roof
steps.description: Draw a triangle to serve as the roof of the house

params.target: Click and drag to draw triangle

steps.verification: Triangle is visible on the canvas

steps.name: Launch Paint

steps.description: Create a new file in Paint
steps.verification: File name is 'Untitled'

steps.name: Draw Rectangle for House
steps.description: Draw a rectangle for the house
steps.verification: Rectangle visible on canvas

steps.name: Draw Door and Windows

steps.description: Save the house drawing as an image file
steps.verification: File saved successfully
